polonnaruwa jala galum nimna jathika udyanaye anawasara waga katayuthu nawathath aarambha kara athi bawata bhikshun wahanse athulu pradeshawasin chodana karanawa.owun ada perawaruwe me sambandhayen wanajiwi karyalayata paminili kirimath samanga unusum thaththwayakda athiwuna.polonnaruwa jala galum nimna jathika udyanaya thula anawasara waga katayuthu saha gawayin athulu kirima athulu minis kriyakarakam siduwana aakaraya pilibandawa mita pera hiru prawruththi osse anawaranayakda sidu kala.anathuruwa wanodyanaya thula siyalu anawasara waga katayuthu thahanam karamin adhikarana niyogayakda nikuth keruna.kesewethath, nawathath jala galum nimna jathika udyanaya thula anawasara waga katayuthu aarambha kara athi bawa pradeshawasin chodana karanawa.pradeshaye bhikshun wahanse athulu janathawa me sambandhayen paminili kirimata ada perawaruwe polonnaruwa wanajiwi karyalayata paminiya.ehidi unusum thaththwayakda hatagaththa.polonnaruwa wanajiwi karyalaye niladhariya sandahan kale wahama ee sambandhayen piyawara ganna bawayi.
